testCase.name: SearchBar - component rendering - should mount successfully
SearchBar - component rendering - should display search input
SearchBar - component rendering - should display search button
SearchBar - component rendering - should show loading state when searching
SearchBar - user interactions - should emit search event when input changes
SearchBar - user interactions - should emit search event on Enter key press
SearchBar - user interactions - should emit clear event when clear button clicked
SearchBar - user interactions - should not search on empty input
SearchBar - user interactions - should trim whitespace from search query
SearchBar - quick search functionality - should emit quick-search event when quick search button clicked
SearchBar - keyboard interactions - should search on Enter key press
SearchBar - keyboard interactions - should clear on Escape key press
SearchBar - accessibility - should have proper ARIA labels
SearchBar - accessibility - should be focusable
SearchBar - responsive behavior - should have mobile-friendly classes
Auth Modal Composables - provideAuthModal - should initialize with default state
Auth Modal Composables - provideAuthModal - should open login modal
Auth Modal Composables - provideAuthModal - should open register modal
Auth Modal Composables - provideAuthModal - should close modal
Auth Modal Composables - provideAuthModal - should handle open without message
Auth Modal Composables - useAuxthModal - should throw error when not provided
Auth Modal Composables - useAuxthModal - should return provided auth modal within component tree
Auth Modal Composables - modal state management - should switch between login and register modes
Auth Modal Composables - modal state management - should preserve open state when switching modes
Auth Modal Composables - modal state management - should clear message on close
LoaderService - basic loading state - should start with no loading state
LoaderService - basic loading state - should show loading when started
LoaderService - basic loading state - should hide loading when stopped
LoaderService - basic loading state - should use default message
LoaderService - nested loading operations - should handle multiple loading operations
LoaderService - nested loading operations - should handle stopping all operations
LoaderService - operation management - should track active operations
LoaderService - operation management - should remove specific operation when stopped
LoaderService - wrapAPICall - should wrap successful API call
LoaderService - wrapAPICall - should wrap failed API call
LoaderService - wrapAPICall - should show loading during API call
LoaderService - wrapAPICall - should use custom operation ID when provided
LoaderService - concurrent operations - should handle concurrent API calls
LoaderService - operation timing - should track operation start time
globalLoader - should be a loader instance
globalLoader - should provide global loading functionality
globalLoader - should maintain state across multiple calls
TMDBService - constructor - should create axios instance with correct config
TMDBService - constructor - should setup interceptors
TMDBService - getPopularMovies - should fetch popular movies successfully
TMDBService - getPopularMovies - should use default page 1
TMDBService - getPopularMovies - should cache results
TMDBService - getPopularMovies - should handle API errors
TMDBService - searchMovies - should search movies successfully
TMDBService - searchMovies - should return empty results for empty query
TMDBService - searchMovies - should encode special characters
TMDBService - getMovieDetails - should fetch movie details successfully
TMDBService - getMovieDetails - should cache movie details
TMDBService - getMovieByTitle - should return exact title match
TMDBService - getMovieByTitle - should return first result if no exact match
TMDBService - getMovieByTitle - should return null if no results
TMDBService - getMovieByTitle - should handle errors gracefully
TMDBService - getImageUrl - should return full image URL with default size
TMDBService - getImageUrl - should return full image URL with custom size
TMDBService - getImageUrl - should return placeholder for null path
TMDBService - cache management - should clear cache successfully
TMDBService - cache management - should return cache stats
